Honestly it would be pretty great having an update where there is seasonal themed items for both Halloween and Christmas. Maybe they can find interesting ways to implement this without breaking the "no furniture" rule.

I would even add that it start 2 weeks before Christmas.  Other popular games like Ark have christmas trees and Santa flying in the sky.  Some of us are away from computer during the actual day so we don't get to enjoy if it is just a 24 hour event.

Hello, I have an interesting idea.

all granite and tuff generated in the month of March, should be replaced with 

‚Äúsham rock‚Äù. It could be polished into polished sham rock, or crafted into ‚Äúsham bricks‚Äù, ‚Äúchiseled sham bricks‚Äù with a shamrock carved in it. When sham bricks are smelted, they could become ‚Äúcracked sham bricks‚Äù. 

PS: when you mine sham rock, it will become cobbled sham rock. Smelt it in a furnace to become regular sham rock.

I have heard a surprisingly and concerning lack of thought or comments on Minecon Live having parties at all or not, which truly scares me as my attending a Minecon Live Party was one of the most fun experiences I've had. A restrictive google search for "minecon live party" yielded 2 (3 total) results, both of which were this one thread. I hope parties haven't been cancelled.

Bonjour j'esp√®re que vous allez bien voil√† mais je sais pas comment se connecter √† bedwars vous pouvez m'aider √† me connecter sur bedwars ce jour sur tablette Samsung j'esp√®re que vous pourrez m'aider parce que moi j'y arrive pas √† me connecter et apr√®s sinon je sais faire et ce que il faut que j'aille tracter serveur public ou que √ßa ajouter un ami que j'ai un compte Microsoft et puis est-ce que je pourrais jouer √† des autres jeux que mon skyblog pixel ajouter des amis et n'oubliez pas que je joue sur tablette
This is just the most hilarious thing I have seen today. And I saw some hilarious things today.

Agreed, the only mention of it being for Bedrock Edition is through an email. It states, "...cape that can be used to customize their in-game character in Minecraft: Bedrock Edition." Please allow Java players to also have this reward for attending this amazing event.

I agree, please add the experience cape to java edition too.

Offering the cape for java edition would encourage more people to buy tickets for the event and make the extra effort and travel plans to come.

Adding to java would also make people talk about the cape more, therefore generating more promotion for the event.
 
This event is also particularly special, being the first large-scale Minecraft in-person event since Minecon in 2016. Let's celebrate this new era of Minecraft's history by adding the cape to both versions, so more people can enjoy the fun!
 
In addition, almost every major cape introduced since the Migrator cape in 2021 has been added to both editions of the game. Adding the cape to java and bedrock too would only continue this trend and not be out of the ordinary. Dare I say, it may even be a bit odd and arbitrary for this cape to only be in one edition.

Thank you for listening to our feedback!
Update: hello@minecraftexperience.com replied to an email stating they received confirmation from the studio that the cape will come to Java Edition, but no date has been confirmed.
yes it makes no sence why it would only be on bedrock edition. especially since its for new and older minecrafters. most of the older Minecraft fans play on java.
I think they said something about losing mobs (sadly not from the first mob vote) are gonna be added eventually, but aren't top priority

An annual contest, centered around a random theme, where some of the most upvoted posts would have their idea implemented into the game would be exciting. Mojang should actually add all of the 'announced features' so a feedback update isn't too bad of an idea.
Still don't understand why so many people hate the phantom, as all of them are hostile mobs I think there would be significant backlash for any mob they put in as they have unique attack methods.

Beacuse phantoms force you to sleep or get attacked by them all night and some players liked the challenge of going out at night and not sleeping so this basically ruined how they like to play the game. Also the blazing inferno wasn't added because of it which would have added a much needed challenge to neather fortresses.
